ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] running speed
ygData.msgSnippet: If this is your 2 cents why don t you keep it to yourself? hm, let s see if any of the other threads going right now meet your lofty standard for not
ygData.messageBody:
If this is your 2 cents why don't you keep it to yourself?
hm, let's see if any of the other threads going right now meet your lofty
standard for "not stupid"...
oh that's right there aren't any. how bout you stop the trolling and post
something useful or keep your insulting comments to yourself.

Now back to the stupid thread:
I agree that computer speed/ram makes a big difference more than stats in
the game for running speed. I have two machines split off one cable modem
connection and the slower machine is always slower running. So, I don't
think you guys are weird hehe; I think you tested perfectly trying your
characters out on different machines.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 7:00 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] running speed


I find this thread to be kinda stupid.

just my 2 cents.

<snip>
